meanings.definition: To cover or pave (a road) with macadam.
meanings.sent1: The workers were macadamizing the street with small stones.
meanings.sent2: The city council decided to macadamize the old road for better durability.
meanings.sent3: Why did the chicken cross the macadamized road? To get to the other side!
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like macadamizing a path through obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the machines macadamizing the highway echoed through the valley.

meanings.definition: The process of surfacing roads with macadam.
meanings.sent1: The macadamizing of the highway was completed ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent2: Macadamizing has been a common road construction method for many years.
meanings.sent3: The children enjoyed watching the macadamizing of the new bike path.
meanings.sent4: The history of macadamizing roads dates back to the 19th century.
meanings.sent5: The smooth surface of the macadamizing made driving much more comfortable.
